column4: BRIEF-Tesla's Elon Musk says Tesla semi unveil is now on November 16 - Tweet
column5: * Tesla's Elon Musk says Tesla semi unveil is now on November 16 - Tweet

column4: Tesla reschedules unveiling of semi-truck to Nov. 16
column5: Oct 6 Tesla Inc Chief Executive Elon Musk said the electric carmaker has rescheduled the unveiling of its semi-truck to Nov. 16 as it diverts resources to fix Model 3 bottlenecks and increase battery production for Puerto Rico and other affected areas.

column4: Tesla to send more battery installers to Puerto Rico to restore power
column5: U.S. electric car and battery maker Tesla Inc's CEO Elon Musk said on Friday the company will send more battery installers to Puerto Rico to help restore power after Hurricane Maria knocked out all power on the island over two weeks ago.

column4: Tesla to send more battery installers to Puerto Rico to restore power
column5: Oct 6 U.S. electric car and battery maker Tesla Inc's CEO Elon Musk said on Friday the company will send more battery installers to Puerto Rico to help restore power after Hurricane Maria knocked out all power on the island over two weeks ago.

column4: Apple names former Honeywell executive as new general counsel
column5: Apple Inc  said on Friday its general counsel  Bruce Sewell  will retire and be succeeded by former Honeywell International Inc  executive Katherine Adams  who will take over Apple's multinational legal battle against Qualcomm Inc .

column4: UPDATE 1-Apple names former Honeywell exec as new general counsel
column5: Oct 6 Apple Inc said on Friday its general counsel  Bruce Sewell  will retire and be succeeded by former Honeywell International Inc executive Katherine Adams  who will take over Apple's multinational legal battle against Qualcomm Inc.
